author: Staff Reporter
text: Women’s World, a not for profit organisation, is conducting free coaching classes for four subjects — Accounting, Maths and Statistics, Economics and Mercantile Law — of CA CPT exam scheduled for June this year. Classes will be held on all days starting April 4 to June 1, from 3 p.m. to 6 p.m. Prof. Kasinath and Prof. Sundaramurthi will conduct the classes. Candidates can call 9382211111/ 9282233333 or visit Women’s World office, 27, Rameswaram Road, T Nagar with a copy of their X and XI mark sheets.
title: Free coaching for CA CPT exam
